ygData.subject: Re: Help with some Occlusion of Sound (55) numbers
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Can it be sung? It cannot be sung. 2) Does it push? No push. 3) Does it have a damage component? No damage component. I actually use this song on mezed MOBs
ygData.messageBody:
1) Can it be sung?

It cannot be sung.


2) Does it push?

No push.


3) Does it have a damage component?

No damage component. I actually use this song on mezed MOBs while the
tanks are taunting.


4) Some numbers please? Preferably with a hand drum, but I'll take
anything ;) Ideally, with all the drums you have ;)

*IF* I remember (I have been bad about this -- see the Lute of the
Howler discussions. *Grins*) I will hit myself with it and see what
it does.


While we are talking about this song, I have started using it in
another way. There have been a couple of times when I have *needed*
to keep a single MOB out of a fight (for example, the Hate 2 [some
MOBs can be mezed] and all the enchanters are dead.) Anyway, One
pulse of OoS followed by a couple pulses of SoT does a very nice job.
(Still cannot get spites in Hate 1. *Grins*)


Gaelthorne
Xegony
